snippet: A middle school principal wants to stockpile cans of corn and peas in classrooms for students to hurl at possible intruders as a last defense.
abstract: Middle school principal in Alabama asks parents to have students bring canned vegetables to school in order to stockpile them in classrooms in order to throw them at possible intruders.
lead_paragraph: A middle school principal wants to stockpile cans of corn and peas in classrooms for students to hurl at possible intruders as a last defense.

headline.main: Alabama: School May Arm Students With Canned Peas
headline.print_headline: Alabama: School May Arm Students With Canned Peas
